roleset.name: switch between two possibilities

roles.note: Second example merges arg1 'thing switching' and arg2 'possibilities'. I don't think the possibilities can be separated into different args ('alternate from X to Y').

example.name: agentive, merged possibilities
example.text: [The two leaders]-1 will meet on Dec. 2 and 3, *trace*-1 alternating the two days of meetings between a U.S. and a Soviet naval vessel in the Mediterranean Sea.
example.arg: between a U.S. and a Soviet naval vessel in the Mediterranean Sea

example.name: this isn't even a verb!
example.text: ``Communism will reach its final stage of development in a feckless Russo -- corporation-socialist in form, nationalistic in content and Oriental in style -- that will puzzle the world with alternating feats of realism and recklessness...''

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia. Member of VNcls amalgamate-22.2-2-1, correlate-86.1.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'alternate' based on sentences in wsj.
